summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Fourteenth Avenue South, from Lander Street to Hanford Street; Hanford Street, from Fourteenth Avenue South to Fifteenth Avenue South; Fifteenth Avenue South produced, from Hanford Street to Dakota (formerly Denny) Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, together with such gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants and other appurtenances as may be necessary for the reasonable water service and fire protection of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 538 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
